id="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-4"> <mxCell style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#99CCFF;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="480" y="40" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="DeviceDefinition" link="https://build.fhir.org/devicedefinition.html" id="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-5"> <mxCell style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#99CCFF;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="130" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <UserObject label="Patient" link="https://build.fhir.org/patient.html" id="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-27"> <mxCell style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFD966;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="940" y="210" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <mxCell id="zz8xENid5W8hlsJIO-TP-3" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-40" target="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-27" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zz8xENid5W8hlsJIO-TP-6" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-40" target="zz8xENid5W8hlsJIO-TP-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="860" y="260" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="zz8xENid5W8hlsJIO-TP-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-40" target="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <UserObject label="Observation" link="https://build.fhir.org/observation.html" id="HDEvXEDxHgeocF4VG-34-40"> <mxCell style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#FFD966;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="650" y="210" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </UserObject> <mxCell id="zz8xENid5W8hlsJIO-TP-1" value="<p style="margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Use case A - Tracking device usage</strong></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Narrative</strong></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Nurse Lisa notices that a blood pressure device is defective and produces incorrect measurement values. The blood pressure device has probably been used to make spot measurements on several patients in the ward. After discussing this with her colleagues, the biomed team gets involved to find out on which patients the defective device has been used since the device´s last technical inspection. Then, the measurements on those patients by that device are labelled as suspicious or erroneous in the patients´ records.&nbsp;</p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><strong>Key Question</strong></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">Which patient(s) used this defective device in this time period?</p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><strong>FHIR resources used to answer question</strong></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">DeviceAssociation and / or DeviceUsage, Device, Patient</p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><b>Possible resource usage scenarios:</b></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"></p><ul><li><span style="background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 238), rgb(237, 237, 237)); color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 13px;">Use the Device referenced by the erroneous Observation to find other Observations in the given period and mark those as erroneous.</span></li><li><span style="background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 238), rgb(237, 237, 237)); color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 13px;">Use the Device referenced by the erroneous Observation to find other DeviceUsage/DeviceAssociation&nbsp; resources with the Device in the given period and from there find the Patients for whom new measurements should be executed.</span></li></ul><p></p><p style="margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, &quot;system-ui&quot;, &quot;Segoe UI&quot;, Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, &quot;Fira Sans&quot;, &quot;Droid Sans&quot;, &quot;Helvetica Neue&quot;, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;"><br></p>" p.style: margin: 0px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;
p.strong: Use case A - Tracking device usage

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

div.p: Nurse Lisa notices that a blood pressure device is defective and produces incorrect measurement values. The blood pressure device has probably been used to make spot measurements on several patients in the ward. After discussing this with her colleagues, the biomed team gets involved to find out on which patients the defective device has been used since the device´s last technical inspection. Then, the measurements on those patients by that device are labelled as suspicious or erroneous in the patients´ records.

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

div.p: Which patient(s) used this defective device in this time period?

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;
p.strong: FHIR resources used to answer question

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

div.p: DeviceAssociation and / or DeviceUsage, Device, Patient

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

span.style: background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 238), rgb(237, 237, 237)); color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 13px;

li.span: Use the Device referenced by the erroneous Observation to find other Observations in the given period and mark those as erroneous.

span.style: background-color: light-dark(rgb(255, 255, 238), rgb(237, 237, 237)); color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 13px;

li.span: Use the Device referenced by the erroneous Observation to find other DeviceUsage/DeviceAssociation resources with the Device in the given period and from there find the Patients for whom new measurements should be executed.

p.style: margin: 10px 0px 0px 40px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(23, 43, 77); font-family: -apple-system, "system-ui", "Segoe UI", Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, "Fira Sans", "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

switch.text: Use case A - Tracking device usage...

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 300px; margin-left: 791px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
